parameters.question: Which action would you use to view the information in a widget?
parameters.choice1: Long-pressing on the app’s icon in Home Screen
parameters.choice3: Finding the widget in your phone’s Home Screen or Lock Screen, and reading the information.
parameters.choice4: Opening your phone’s Settings, and finding the app associated with the widget
parameters.answer: Finding the widget in your phone’s Home Screen or Lock Screen, and reading the information.
